tool_description: 🥇The only movie & series database with stream link '.m3u8' URLs, enriched with TMDB.🥇
name: Chillflix
title: Chillflix

api_list.name: Movie list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chillflix.p.rapidapi.com/movie_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chillflix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
